text: I see that this change causes tests to fail, but without these changes both prepare_authorization_request and prepare_refresh_token_request fail when using WebApplicationClient.  I will continue to mess around with this and see what it causing it, but it appears that it may be my issue internally.
title: nan

text: Already in master. Thanks for your contribution.
title: nan

text:
A thousand times yes. Been meaning to send out a plea for this but yet to get around to it. Last few months have been and continue to be super busy.

I'm sure there are a bunch of able hands out there and several of these are probably waiting in the PR queue already. Lets try and get through this together, I will merge any PR that has 1 or more "Looks good to me" comments on it. Please ping this bug when a PR has been reviewed and I'll make sure I take a look within the next working day :)

When the bug queue has been cleared I'll add write access to people who are interested.
title: nan

text:
I'm excited to announce that the contributor bit is now flipped for @masci, @lepture, @tilgovi, @georgewhewell, @samjacoby, @foxx, @thedrow :) Thanks for all your contributions so far and I'm looking forward to see where you help steer oauthlib from here!

I think one thing we should look at doing soon is a new PyPI release (#346). Anyone fancy writing up a change list? I'll push once we have one. 

As always, if you have a question, would like to discuss something or simply draw my attention somewhere feel free email/hangouts msg me at ib.lundgren@gmail.com. 

p.s. If you would like to become a contributor please get in touch. In this round I included people from this thread but there are many more who have made great contributions in the past. If you are one of those please do not be offended but rather sent me an email :)
